name: Deep Space Ball
description:
In this game you just rolling the space ball and touch the exit door cube and do not fall from the obstacle course. The reason i named "Deep Space Ball" because when i open the "SkyBox Volume 2" folder there a file starting with "DeepSpaceBlue" to "Stars01" folder, thats why i named like this. Turn up your volume to hear the sound.

Controls: WASD for Move.

Credits: Skybox Volume 2 Nebula by Hedgehog Team and Space Ambient Album by GWriterStudio.
